name: SetupRails
body:
### Welcome to SetupRails.
This installer was designed to ease the installation process for a typical Ruby on Rails development machine. It currently supports OSX Mavericks and OSX Yosemite (Ubuntu Linux support coming soon).

To run the installer simply copy and paste the following to your Terminal prompt:
```
sh <(curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/brianhays/setuprails/master/setup_rails.sh)
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
